News.headline: Tickets: Southport v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Southport v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Southport v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers’ trip to Haig Avenue on Saturday 11th February, 3:00pm KO
News.description:
Please note that tickets for this game will be pay on the day onlyand Southport can’t accept credit/debit card payments at the turnstiles.

Away fans can either go into the main stand or into the Terracing, and there will be segregation in both of the stands.

Ticket Prices:

Main Stand:
Adults - £15.00
Concessions - £11.00
12-18 year olds - £5.00
Under 11’s – FREE (with paying Adult)

Terrace:
Adults - £13.50
Concessions - £10.00
12-18 year olds - £5.00
Under 11’s – FREE (with paying Adult)

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
The disabled person or carer on his/her behalf goes to the ticket office to purchase a ticket at the appropriate age category, while the carer is admitted free.

The disabled person and his/her carer then enter through the disabled gate (if a wheelchair they go in the paddock. If ambulant disabled they can sit in the stand).
